title: Episode 4: Historic Blunder Of Epic Proportions?
dc:creator: Martine Powers
description: SafeTrack hits its second phase, with full shutdowns of sections of the Orange Line forcing commuters to use bus "bridges" between stations. What if Metro had built extra tracks, though? We talk to a historian about why redundant stretches of rail weren't part of the system's blueprint.
